nodes.title: Update Spanish translation: fix typo and other minor fixes
Add setting to display Starred Radio at startup
proxy - do not stop on error; increase buffer & timeout
Provide text alternatives for image only buttons increasing overal app accessibility
Red color for station name while recording a station and MPD timeout
Fix leaking intent receiver in ItemAdapterStation. Fix #290
Add support for headphone inline controls, fix #261.
Add option to change recording's file name format. Fix #273
Speed for list item, alert for backstack handler, fixes for bugs
Improve playback stability, refactor recording, fixes for mediaplayer
Themes support, circular icons, compact style, backstack support

swipe left or right to remove
enable search also on history and favorite view

show delete buttons only for non-empty favorite/history lists

add delete button and confirmation questions for history or favorites
show toasts when starring/unstarring in expanded view
make the stationview show the correct title
Fix crash in notification due to unsupported drawable type on old APIs
refresh history immediately when an item is clicked
Add support for external equalizers, solves #122
Add support of lyric apps (set necessary metadata in media session), solves #129
fix #200 - return support of older android sdk >= 15
add a space after each comma in stations tags text line
Fix crash when reopening application (add check if extras exist in onNewIntent)
Improve stations list design, image loading and caching, add clickable tags to station, add ability to copy stream url
bump version 0.39; chg recording filename: append the streamtitle if available
add pause button to playerinfo; refactored playeraction
chg recording filename: append the streamtitle if available
chg filename recording format: starts with date

fix #165 - Not playing certain radio stations
Bugfix for switching from native replay to chromecast while playing.

Move stop record and closing streams into the proxy thread. Better error logging. Reformat code.
Fix random resume. Fix holding wifi and wake lock while paused. Small refactoring.

Refactor PlayerService. Add media button support. Add pause/resume. Other small improvements

fix exception on loading old alarms
